patthana15.32:1.1_0: Noāsavaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.32:2.1_0: Āsavaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.32:3.1_0: Noāsavaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nanoāsavo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
